subject: Basketball (College)
National Invitation Tournament
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Of the last 20 N.I.T. winners, 10 made the step to the N.C.A.A. tournament the next year. But most were only middle-ish seeds.
snippet: Of the last 20 N.I.T. winners, 10 made the step to the N.C.A.A. tournament the next year. But most were only middle-ish seeds.
